docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Set the MSO2XX Function Generator settings.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: The type of waveform to use.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: The frequency of the waveform, in Hz.

parameters.name: amplitude
parameters.description: The peak to peak voltage of the waveform, in volts.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The voltage offset of the waveform, in volts.

parameters.name: ramp_symmetry
parameters.description: The ramp symmetry if the ramp waveform is used, in percent.

parameters.name: square_duty
parameters.description: The duty of the square waveform if used, in percent.

parameters.name: pulse_width
parameters.description: The pulse width in seconds if the pulse waveform is used.
